newsletterDescription: Subscribe to get notified by email about a new post.
description: Hello! I'm Lucas. Front end developer.
description2: I'm from Brazil but currently i'm based in Ottawa, Canada working at <1>Shopify.</1>
description3: I'm passionate about programming and also a UX enthusiast, always trying to learn and advocate for the best practices on both worlds.
workDescription: Those are the main technologies i'm using right now, but i'm always open to learn and explore new ones. For more information check out <1>Work</1>.
whyMedium: I'm too lazy to implement a blog myself, so i'll be doing my posts on <1>Medium</1>.
reasonToWriteInPortuguese: I write in portuguese because i think we already have way too much content in english out there, so i'm trying to be more inclusive and focused on my fellow brazilians.

ShopifyDescription.first: Working on the Shipping team, my primary job is to help developers and UXers to plan and develop user interfaces for more than a million merchants around the world. The main technologies i use are React, GraphQL, Apollo, Typescript and Polaris. Also, when necessary, i work in the back-end using Ruby on Rails, but my primary focus is on the front-end.
ShopifyDescription.second: Some projects i was proudly a part of:

1STiDescription.first: Developing the UI of projects using modern Front end technologies such as: React, Redux, styled-components, RxJS, Firebase, WebRTC and pusherjs
